text: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيۡنَٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُواْۖ وَهَلۡ نُجَٰزِيٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡكَفُورَ
translation: Icabakuye amata mu kanwa, bakarumanga bahora basomera, ni ubugarariji bwabo no kudashimira Imana Allah. Burya Twebwe Allah, ntiduhana ngo duhashe kiretse abimonogoje mu bugarariji no mu kwihakana inema zacu.
